Okay, for those of you that are having issues with finding setup-1.bin, when it prompts you to do it, stop the installation, unmount and remount it, then open the folder to view files. Then copy the setup-1 to your desktop or somewhere easy to access. Re-run the installation. When it prompts you to find setup-1.bin, browse to where you put it and select that folder. It'll install and you can enjoy it!
Hell Yeah! Thank you!

Install Instruction:
1.Make a new folder (call it Castle Crashers or something)
2.Use a program that can mount/burn disc images (my preferred is PowerISO) to extract the contents of fan-cacr.bin to the folder you made
3.Then you may either run the extracted setup.exe or mount the image to a virtual disc drive to install
4.When prompted to find the next disc destination simply choose your folder you created and press ok.
5.The game will install and you can play :)
NOTE: I havent found a crack yet so unfortunately only single player is available
